metadata.synopsis: One shot voicebark in the Lower City. One origin character remarks something while passing through an area, then three other origins may respond to that remark. The respondents are prioritized from top to bottom. If none of the respondents are available, this won't play.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Go to S_LOW_OneShotVB_Minsc_GiantSpaceHamsters_ed2f8d68-a1db-4ff1-9fcf-242bfd995311 at the park entrance with the initiator + one the respondents in your party

1.speaker: Minsc
1.text: The githyanki must meet many giant space hamsters, but I bet they have ever seen one as small as Boo!

0.speaker: Player
0.text: |I think I read about them in a book before.|
